Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.entity

Class Question

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Question
public class Question extends Object
The class representing each question record.

      name - the Question itself
      type - the type of the Question. Its either Single or Multiple.
      optionA -
      optionB -
      optionC -
      optionD -
      answer - the Upper-Case character that represents the correct option
      score - positive integer that determines the score of the question
